title: Login issue
description: Customer cannot log into the account with correct credentials.

title: Payment not processing
description: Customer reported that credit card payment is failing.

title: Feature request
description: Customer requested a dark mode feature for the dashboard.

title: Mobile app crash
description: App crashes when opening notifications tab.

title: Email not received
description: Customer is not receiving verification emails.

title: Order not delivered
description: Customer placed an order a week ago but has not received it.

title: Password reset issue
description: Password reset link expired before customer could use it.

title: Refund request
description: Customer requested a refund for a canceled order.

title: Account suspended
description: Customer account was suspended without clear reason.

title: Shipping delay
description: Customer reported delay in product shipment.
